verses.verse: וַיֹּסִ֙פוּ֙ <S%H3254><s%> vai-yo-Si-fu again בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיִּתְּנֵ֧ם <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nem delivered יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- them into the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim of the Philistines אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im forty שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah. years פ Peh

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man אֶחָ֧ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad And there was a certain מִצָּרְעָ֛ה <S%H6881><s%> mitz-tza-re-'Ah of Zorah מִמִּשְׁפַּ֥חַת <S%H4940><s%> mi-mish-Pa-chat of the family הַדָּנִ֖י <S%H1839><s%> had-da-Ni of the Danites וּשְׁמ֣וֹ <S%H8034><s%> u-she-Mo whose name מָנ֑וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> ma-No-ach; [was] Manoah וְאִשְׁתּ֥וֹ <S%H802><s%> ve-'ish-To and his wife עֲקָרָ֖ה <S%H6135><s%> 'a-ka-Rah [was] barren וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo no יָלָֽדָה׃ <S%H3205><s%> ya-La-dah. and bare

וַיֵּרָ֥א <S%H7200><s%> vai-ye-Ra appeared מַלְאַךְ־ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'ach- And the angel יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah; unto the woman וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֵלֶ֗יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha, to her הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> hin-neh- Behold נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> na now אַתְּ־ <S%H859><s%> 'at- you עֲקָרָה֙ <S%H6135><s%> 'a-ka-Rah unto her Behold now thou [art] barren וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo no יָלַ֔דְתְּ <S%H3205><s%> ya-Ladt, and bearest וְהָרִ֖ית <S%H2029><s%> ve-ha-Rit not but thou shalt conceive וְיָלַ֥דְתְּ <S%H3205><s%> ve-ya-Ladt and bear בֵּֽן׃ <S%H1121><s%> Ben. a son

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now הִשָּׁ֣מְרִי <S%H8104><s%> hish-Sha-me-ri Now therefore beware נָ֔א <S%H4994><s%> Na, I beseech thee וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- nor תִּשְׁתִּ֖י <S%H8354><s%> tish-Ti I pray thee and drink יַ֣יִן <S%H3196><s%> Ya-yin not wine וְשֵׁכָ֑ר <S%H7941><s%> ve-she-Char; nor strong drink וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- nor תֹּאכְלִ֖י <S%H398><s%> toch-Li and eat כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any טָמֵֽא׃ <S%H2931><s%> ta-Me. not any unclean

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki For הִנָּ֨ךְ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Nach behold הָרָ֜ה <S%H2029><s%> ha-Rah been וְיֹלַ֣דְתְּ <S%H3205><s%> ve-yo-Ladt and bear בֵּ֗ן <S%H1121><s%> Ben, a son וּמוֹרָה֙ <S%H4177><s%> u-mo-Rah and no razor לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- and no יַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Leh shall come עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho, on his head כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for נְזִ֧יר <S%H5139><s%> ne-Zir shall be a Nazarite אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him unto God יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become הַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar for the child מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַבָּ֑טֶן <S%H990><s%> hab-Ba-ten; from the womb וְה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu, and he יָחֵ֛ל <S%H2490><s%> ya-Chel and he shall begin לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <S%H3467><s%> le-ho-Shi-a' to deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim. of the Philistines

וַתָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> vat-ta-Vo came הָאִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah, Then the woman וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer and told לְאִישָׁהּ֮ <S%H376><s%> le-'i-Shah her husband לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish A man הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> ba came אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me וּמַרְאֵ֕הוּ <S%H4758><s%> u-mar-'E-hu unto me and his countenance כְּמַרְאֵ֛ה <S%H4758><s%> ke-mar-'Eh [was] like the countenance מַלְאַ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'Ach of an angel הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God נוֹרָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> no-Ra terrible מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; very וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor שְׁאִלְתִּ֙יהוּ֙ <S%H7592><s%> she-'il-Ti-hu but I asked אֵֽי־ <S%H335><s%> 'ei- where מִזֶּ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh he ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo he me his name לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor הִגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> hig-Gid him not whence he [was] neither told לִֽי׃ Li.

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer But he said לִ֔י Li, הִנָּ֥ךְ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Nach Behold הָרָ֖ה <S%H2029><s%> ha-Rah been וְיֹלַ֣דְתְּ <S%H3205><s%> ve-yo-Ladt and bear בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> Ben; a son וְעַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah and now אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nor תִּשְׁתִּ֣י׀ <S%H8354><s%> tish-Ti nor strong drink יַ֣יִן <S%H3196><s%> Ya-yin no wine וְשֵׁכָ֗ר <S%H7941><s%> ve-she-Char, and now drink וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- nor תֹּֽאכְלִי֙ <S%H398><s%> to-che-Li neither eat כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any טֻמְאָ֔ה <S%H2932><s%> tum-'Ah, any unclean כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for נְזִ֤יר <S%H5139><s%> ne-Zir shall be a Nazarite אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him to God יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become הַנַּ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar, [thing] for the child מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַבֶּ֖טֶן <S%H990><s%> hab-Be-ten from the womb עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom to the day מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4194><s%> mo-To. of his death פ Peh

וַיֶּעְתַּ֥ר <S%H6279><s%> vai-ye'-Tar intreated מָנ֛וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> ma-No-ach Then Manoah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar; and said בִּ֣י <S%H994><s%> bi O אֲדוֹנָ֔י <S%H136><s%> a-do-Nai, my Lord אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish the man הָאֱלֹהִ֞ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom שָׁלַ֗חְתָּ <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach-ta, which thou didst send יָבוֹא־ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo- come again נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> na let עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> 'Od again אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-nu, about וְיוֹרֵ֕נוּ <S%H3384><s%> ve-yo-Re-nu unto us and teach מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what נַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Seh us what we shall do לַנַּ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> lan-Na-'ar unto the child הַיּוּלָּֽד׃ <S%H3205><s%> hai-yul-Lad. that shall be born

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' hearkened הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him And God בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol to the voice מָנ֑וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> ma-No-ach; of Manoah וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came again מַלְאַךְ֩ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'aCh and the angel הָאֱלֹהִ֨ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God ע֜וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah, unto the woman וְהִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hi she יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> yo-She-vet as she sat בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> bas-sa-Deh, in the field וּמָנ֥וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> u-ma-No-ach but Manoah אִישָׁ֖הּ <S%H376><s%> 'i-Shah her husband אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein else עִמָּֽהּ׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mah. with

וַתְּמַהֵר֙ <S%H4116><s%> vat-te-ma-Her made haste הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H376><s%> ha-'ish-Shah, her husband וַתָּ֖רָץ <S%H7323><s%> vat-Ta-rotz and ran וַתַּגֵּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> vat-tag-Ged and shewed לְאִישָׁ֑הּ <S%H802><s%> le-'i-Shah; And the woman וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer and said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, about הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold נִרְאָ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> nir-'Ah hath appeared אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish, unto him Behold the man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> ba unto me that came בַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> vai-Yom unto me the [other] day אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai. about

וַיָּ֛קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom arose וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech Then מָנ֖וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> ma-No-ach And Manoah אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To; his wife וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish, to the man וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said ל֗וֹ lo, הַאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> ha-'at-Tah are you הָאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish unto him [Art] thou the man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who דִּבַּ֥רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ta that spakest אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah his wife וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni. I

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מָנ֔וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> ma-No-ach, And Manoah עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah Now יָבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo come to pass דְבָרֶ֑יךָ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rei-cha; Now let thy words מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what יִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become מִשְׁפַּט־ <S%H4941><s%> mish-pat- How shall we order הַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar the child וּמַעֲשֵֽׂהוּ׃ <S%H4639><s%> u-ma-'a-Se-hu. and [how] shall we do

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מַלְאַ֥ךְ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'Ach And the angel יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מָנ֑וֹחַ <S%H4495><s%> ma-No-ach; unto Manoah מִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- i אָמַ֥רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti Of all that I said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah unto the woman תִּשָּׁמֵֽר׃ <S%H8104><s%> tish-sha-Mer. let her beware

מִכֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol anything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- that יֵצֵא֩ <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze of any [thing] that cometh מִגֶּ֨פֶן <S%H1612><s%> mig-Ge-fen of the vine הַיַּ֜יִן <S%H3196><s%> hai-Ya-yin wine לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo should not תֹאכַ֗ל <S%H398><s%> to-Chal, She may not eat וְיַ֤יִן <S%H3196><s%> ve-Ya-yin wine וְשֵׁכָר֙ <S%H7941><s%> ve-she-Char or strong drink אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nor תֵּ֔שְׁתְּ <S%H8354><s%> Te-shet, neither let her drink וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol any טֻמְאָ֖ה <S%H2932><s%> tum-'Ah any unclean אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nor תֹּאכַ֑ל <S%H398><s%> to-Chal; nor eat כֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- i צִוִּיתִ֖יהָ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-vi-Ti-ha [thing] all that I commanded תִּשְׁמֹֽר׃ <S%H8104><s%> tish-Mor. her let her observe
